text:
There is no documentation (that I could find) indicating that the order of 
AddModule statements within the configuration file.

This was apparent when attempting to use VirtualDocumentRoot and UserDir 
operators.  The idea configuration would be to have document roots specified by 
the hostname, except where ~<uid> was used in the path.  In this case, the 
public_html directory specified by UserDir should take precidence.

In the initial configuration, AddModule mod_userdir.c preceeded AddModule 
mod_vhost_alias.c.  This caused all ~<uid> requests to be mapped to the 
document root of the host.  After swapping the two directives (mod_userdir.c 
after mod_vhost_alias.c), the ~<uid> requests were successful as well as 
virtual document root request.

Had this been documented in the AddModule reference, a couple of hours work 
would have been saved.
creator: jjolly@mindless.com

text:
Not a bad sugestion.  But the best we can do is say "AddModule order is
important" and perhaps provide an example.  There are too many particular
interactions to document all of them.

This problem goes away in 2.0 where module ordering is determined by the
modules themselves.
creator: slive@apache.org

text:
I think the suggestion to document that "AddModule order is important" with an 
example is a good one.  Even including a statement after the example indicating 
module interaction is very complex and not all possible interactions can be 
shown.

A couple more specifics, though.  It might be good to explain a little how 
module loading occurs.  That the modules are accessed in order from the last 
AddModule, bottom-up to the first AddModule.  Also, describing that a module 
can indicate that it has handled a particular job (such as redirection in my 
case) and Apache at that point will stop calling other modules.

Just some suggestions.  As you can see, my documentation skills are very 
underdeveloped so I rely on people more adept at writing documentation to 
organize the ideas I have into a more lucid form.  So far, I think the changes 
suggested will help conciderably.
creator: jjolly@mindless.com

text:
Doc updated with a note on AddModule ordering.

Thanks for your suggestion.
creator: slive@apache.org
